name: Sublingual
description:
An experiment with the wonderful sounds our mouths can make 👄

In development for Android, iOS, PC and Mac

Made in Unity with the Wwise audio engine

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

P L A Y I N G :

Everything is point, click and drag 🖱️

At the moment, there's no end state or quit - you just need to [Alt+F4] or exit out on Android.

All assets should be considered "in progress." We're testing different kinds of interactions and visuals. 

All feedback is appreciated 🙏
